description:
This stylish unit is in a fantastic central location. It is conveniently positioned between Northcote, Fairfield and Alphington allowing you to leave the car at home and get out and about on foot, bike or public transport to enjoy all that the inner north has to offer!

Fairfield Park & Boathouse, Darebin Parklands and Yarra Bend Golf Club are all only minutes away. Close by on both Station and High Street there is a wide range of cafes and restaurants to choose from providing you with many delicious options.

However should you wish to cook at home, you have your choice of major, Mediterranean, and organic supermarkets as well. The Palace Westgarth Cinema is just up the road, or, if you feel like a night out of live comedy, you can always walk around the corner to The Grandview Hotel and enjoy a meal and a laugh with the locals.

The moment you walk through the door of this stylish pad you will be delighted by the abundance of natural light. One of the standout features of this property is that there are two, terra-cotta tiled, private balconies to pick from - so you can either relax and enjoy the serenity or host a fun BBQ on the main balcony before retreating to the central lounge.

The well-appointed kitchen boasts a Fishel Paykel dishwasher, German engineered oven and stove top by NEFF and mirrored splash backs - all of which make cooking in the kitchen a joy. Also bringing bliss throughout this abode are the honey coloured wooden floorboards with their appealing look and feel, making every room, picture perfect.

Both bedrooms are of a generous size with beautiful feature walls, built-in-mirrored-robes and direct access the balconies via floor to ceiling double-glazed, glass, sliding French doors.

The bathroom has a tasteful monochrome palette, powerful shower head, and ample space for your washer and or dryer. To keep cool or warm there is a split system in the lounge, which is more than enough to create the ultimate living environment to the point that you may not wish to ever leave home.

Set in a boutique block with a great community of friendly residents you will enjoy the benefits of a shared landscaped courtyard, secure intercom entrance, storage cage and a basement carpark. The proximity Fairfield and Dennis train stations and #86 Tram to High Street make getting around a breeze. It is also in the zone and accessible to the best private and public schools in the area.

If you have been looking for a property in Northcote that can give you location, luxury, and lifestyle then this it! It’s time to make this unit YOUR home. We look forward to seeing you at one of our scheduled inspections.

Offers welcome prior.
